Inscribe [i]( Your enchantments can help cast this spell. Each enchantment you tap after you're done activating mana abilities pays for {1} or one mana of that enchantment's colors.)[/i]
Latent Titan enters tapped.
Whenever you cast a spell that targets Latent Titan, draw a card.
Crew 3 [i](Tap any number of creatures you control with total power 3 or more: This Vehicle becomes an artifact creature until end of turn.)[/i]
